com.smartitengineering.rs
Class SmartProvider

java.lang.Object
  com.smartitengineering.rs.SmartProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyReader, javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter
@Provider
public class SmartProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter, javax.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyReader

This is the provider for XML and JSON output/input. It uses Exporter and Importer to format and parse. Each of the implementation will be responsible for only a specific MediaType.

Since:
0.4
Author:
imyousuf
